config.section.npcPreferences.name: NPC preferences
config.section.npcPreferences.tooltip:
Controls how to modify the gift taste for the given gift methods.
"Hates": -2 tiers
"Dislikes, hates frequent": -1 tier, -2 tiers past the frequent %
"Hates frequent": -1 tier past the infrequent %, -2 tiers past the frequent %
"Dislikes": -1 tier
"Dislikes frequent": no change, -1 tier past the frequent %
"Neutral": no change
"Likes infrequent, dislikes frequent": +1 tier, no change past the infrequent %, -1 tier past the frequent %
"Likes infrequent": no change, +1 tier below the infrequent %
"Likes": +1 tier
"Loves infrequent": +2 tiers below the infrequent %, +1 tier below the frequent %
"Likes, loves infrequent": +1 tier, +2 tiers below the infrequent %
"Loves": +2 tiers
config.section.overrides.name: Overrides
config.enableNpcOverrides.name: Enable NPC overrides
config.enableNpcOverrides.tooltip:
Enables this mod's NPC overrides.
The overrides currently include:
- Dwarf: hates by mail
- Elliott: neutral
- Krobus: hates by mail
- Leo: loves infrequent by mail
- Linus: dislikes, hates frequent by mail
- Penny: neutral
- Sandy: likes infrequent in-person, likes infrequent but dislikes frequent by mail
- Sebastian: dislikes in-person, neutral by mail
- Wizard: dislikes frequent in-person, neutral by mail

config.enableModOverrides.name: Enable mod overrides
config.enableModOverrides.tooltip:
Whether mod overrides should be enabled.
This allows mods to specify whether NPCs (dis)like mailed/in-person gifts.

If disabled, the above settings will be used as default.
If enabled, a mod's override will be preferred over the defaults.
  (but not over an NPC-specific config override).
